description: Try our easy to follow Wasabi Beef & Pak Choi recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Wasabi Beef & Pak Choi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g pak choi, cut lengthways into 8 pieces
5 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the barbecue or charcoal grill until hot. Mix together 1 tablespoon of the olive oil and the wasabi paste. Use to coat the sirloin steaks, ensuring a thin, even covering.
Sit the steaks on the barbecue and grill fiercely over a high heat for 3 minutes on each side. Remove to a plate, and leave to rest in a warm place for 5 minutes.

Meanwhile, toss the pak choi in the remaining olive oil with the garlic and soy sauce. Grill for 2-3 minutes, or until charred and just wilted. To serve, cut the steak into 1cm slices, season, and serve with the pak choi.
